acceptedAnswer.text: Flames Check is a modern glow-up of the classic 90s FLAMES love game — powered by a mix of numerology and nostalgia. Just type two names, and we'll instantly reveal your relationship vibe: Love, Friendship, Affection, Marriage, Enemy, or Sibling. It's fast, fun, and totally free.

Flames Check uses a simple yet calculated process that matches the letters in your names, runs them through our upgraded algorithm, and gives you a result that represents your connection energy. It's like a vibe calculator — fun enough to play with your crush, friends, or even your favorite celebrities.

mainEntity.name: Is the Flames Check result accurate?

acceptedAnswer.text: It's meant for fun and self-discovery, not serious matchmaking. While the numerology adds a unique twist, Flames Check is designed to give you playful insights — so take it as entertainment, not absolute truth.

mainEntity.name: Can I use Flames Check for anyone?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! Use it to check your vibe with: Your crush or partner, Your best friend or barkada, A classmate, ex, or even a celebrity. Basically, if there's a connection, you can test it!

mainEntity.name: What do the FLAMES letters mean?

acceptedAnswer.text: Each letter stands for a different type of connection: L — Love: Mutual attraction or deeper connection. F — Friendship: Pure good vibes; your ride-or-die. A — Affection: A spark that's still growing. E — Enemy: Watch out for drama — maybe not your match. M — Marriage: The ultimate forever bond. S — Sibling: Loyal, platonic, and always there for you.

It's a fun feature where you can test the FLAMES compatibility of your favorite celebrity couples — just for laughs or curiosity! Think: Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce? KathNiel? DonBelle? See what the algorithm says about their vibe!

mainEntity.name: Is Flames Check free to use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes — 100% free. No sign-ups, no weird subscriptions, no hidden fees. Just drop the names, get your result, and share the tea.
Absolutely. Flames Check doesn't store your data, names, or results. Everything happens instantly in your browser — your secrets stay safe with you.

mainEntity.name: Can I share my Flames Check result on social media?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! After you get your result, you can easily screenshot or share it on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, or with your group chat. Tag us @FlamesCheck so we can repost your results!

Flames Check was built by a small creative team passionate about combining nostalgic fun and modern tech — inspired by the Filipino schoolyard game we all loved, but redesigned for a global Gen Z audience.

mainEntity.name: Why do people love Flames Check?

acceptedAnswer.text: Because it's fun, fast, and feels real. It helps you get clarity (or chaos) in a few seconds — without the stress of guessing what your connection means. Plus, it's totally shareable and main-character energy approved.
Easy! Go to FlamesCheck.com, type your names, and hit Check My Name Now. In just seconds, your result will pop up — ready to share with the world.
